title: Data usage reported differently in App/WiFi settings
content:
Hello,
I noticed differences in the Data usage (both WiFi and mobile) report if checking it through WiFi settings or App settings: Google Play Services, in the last month, consumed:
- through App Settings: 34MB
- through WiFi Settings: 12,86GB
  Is it normal such a difference?
May it be responsible of the battery drain I notice while casting Netflix, YouTube, Spotify etc to my chromecast (correctly detected by Google Home)?

I attached the screenshots containing the data I cited (, WiFi Settings, WiFi Settings)
 Thanks for any suggestion.
Flavio
